Venue

  • Home
  • Venue
  • Gangneung Olympic Park

Gangneung Olympic Park

The venue for the '26th Gangneung ITS World Congress'

The ITS PARK

This the Gangneung Olympic Park to be transformed as The ITS Park

As the venue for the 2018 PyeongChang Winter Olympics, Gangneung Olympic Park was completed in 2017 and has since been utilized as a multipurpose space for sports and international events. Beyond hosting the 2026 ITS World Congress, it is set to transform into the epicenter of the global ITS festival

  • 01
    Gangneung Oval >> Exhibition Center 1
  • 02
    Gangneung Arena >> Exhibition Center 2
  • 03
    Hockey Center >> Gala Dinner
  • 04
    *New Building : Convention Center

Convention Center

New Convention Center customized for ITS WC

Gangneung Convention Center is scheduled to be completed as a state-of-the-art facility that meets the hosting criteria for the ITS World Congress

  • 01
    Site Area : 41,107 ㎡
  • 02
    Total Area : 42,019 ㎡, 4F/B2F

Exhibition Center

From the Olympic legacy to ITS legacy

The two Olympic venues are set to be renovated into the exhibition space for the ITS World Congress by 2025, in line with the global trend of activating large-scale structures, pursuing urban regeneration and sustainable development

  • Gangneung Oval >> Exhibition Center 1
  • Gangneung Arena >> Exhibition Center 2
  • 01
    Total Area : 25,217 ㎡ (*ITS Guidline : 20,000 ㎡ or more)
  • 02
    Ex Center 1 : 20,899 ㎡
  • 03
    EX Center 2 : 4,318 ㎡

Directions

지도 API

The address of Gangneung Olympic Park

  • Gangneung Arena : 102 Suri Gol-gil, Gangneung City
  • Indoor Multi-Sports Complex, Curling Rink, Ice Rink : 32 Jonghapundongjang-gil, Gangneung City
  • Gangneung Oval (Gangneung Speed Skating Oval) : 100 Suri Gol-gil, Gangneung City
  • Gangneung Hockey Center : 98 Suri Gol-gil, Gangneung City
